Animated tree lights!

Configure: 
- Display style
- Weather with/without location enabled

- High/low of day
Battery value on lower right corner

data.author: Marty Kausas
data.description:
WaveWatcher is a watchface that displays surf information to the user. With a completely beach themed look, WaveWatcher is a clean watchface for those who want to quickly check surf, water temperature, air temperature, and visibility on the coastline.

The graph on the left displays the rise and fall of swell height for the current and next 7 hours.

Powered by World Weather Online
data.title: WaveWatcher

data.description:
Look at time as a resource
1. set your preferred time of the end of your productive day
2. see the remaining hours and minutes for today. The green background changes to yellow, if less than three hours are remaining, and to red, if it is less than one hour.

For example: you know you're able to work till 22:00 (10 PM). You set 22:00 in the configuration. At 8:30 in the morning you will see 13:30 remaining.

It works with working over the midnight. So at 10PM you will have 4 hours till 2 AM.
data.title: Useful time remaining

data.author: ewedel

changelog.release_notes: Fix a high-latitude bug, where both edges of a twilight band are on the same side of midnight.
Add support for Time Round, and various bug fixes.
Use watch's DST setting (no more manual updates for DST changes), and make hour hand more visible at night on color screens.

Restore accidentally-removed automatic request of location data at each startup of watchface. This can be useful when the watch's cached location has become stale due to, e.g., travelling to some other location.
Pebble Time: clean up hour hand display, add low-battery indicator.
Adds support for the Pebble Time watch.
Enables basic watchface operation under iOS. Config pages are still not operating correctly however. Watchface remains fully functional with Android devices.
Minor update: fix missing semicolon reported by jslint.
Speculative fix for iOS missing location data / hang issue.
Add basic configuration pages to show and/or send current location to the watchface without needing to exit and reenter the watchface as before.
Release 2.0.1: Change so that initial display includes populated date and rise/set values: workaround for load hesitation in 1.x version is no longer needed.

data.description: A daily almanac for your Pebble. Displays lunar phase, sunrise and sunset times, and bands representing civil, nautical and astronomical twilight on a 24-hour watch dial. An hour hand shows the time of day on the watch dial. A digital display offers date and time, which honors your Pebble's 12/24 hour configuration.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix a high-latitude bug, where both edges of a twilight band are on the same side of midnight.

data.title: Twilight SunClock

data.author: dblaine

changelog.release_notes: Bug fix.
Fix bug where watchface cannot load initially.
Fix bugs affecting only original Pebble and Pebble Steel watches.
Show most recent forecast when returning to watchface.  Minor display design change when seconds are shown.
Fix auto detection of country and from the country to default temperature scale (metric or imperial).  Add configuration of the order of minimum and maximum temperatures.
Custom day of week.  You can enter your own day of week abbreviations.

Fixed developer hack where the current conditions is always sunny.  Oops!

In progress:  enhanced custom day of the week abbreviation.
Fix spacing between current temperature and current conditions (in top left).
Fix bug when the date is a single digit (undisplayable space character).
Added single letter abreviations for days of the week.  Color configuration for Pebble Time.
Fix forecast off by one day.  Symptom: early in the morning, the first forecast is yesterday.  Code has a workaround for when openweathermap returns yesterday as a forecast.
Setting for default location when the location cannot be detected.
Fix recall of settings for timeout and forecast.  Minor positioning adjustment of hourly temperatures.
Configuration for timeout and preferred forecast.
Don't turn on debugging for spurious location detection error.
Fix time of the weather forecast.
Fix hourly forecast display for 12 hour format.  Remember configuration selections on the configuration page,
Configurable color and temperature scale.
Enable multilingual (localization).
Better horizontal adjustment of 12 hour time.

data.description: Watchface with time and weather forecast. Current temperature and weather conditions at top left. Celsius or Fahrenheit configurable. Shows seconds with a shake or tap. The seconds go away after a few minutes to save battery life. The forecast alternates between daily and hourly forecasts with a shake or tap. Weather forecast provided by openweathermap, updated every 60 minutes.
data.title: Time and Forecast

data.description:
Clean LCARS (Star Trek) watchface. Showing current date, day of week, time, Bluetooth and battery status plus current weather.
Pebble Health support: As you start walking or running, the weather bar is replaced with steps and an average.

The configuration supports F/C, showing seconds and a format of date. 12/24h is supported via the watch settings.
data.title: LCARS

data.author: Brian Douglass

changelog.release_notes: Fixed "Low Power during Quiet Time" not working as expected
Fixed bug where weather stopped working.
Added new option to specify a location rather than use GPS
Fixed settings not being accessible
Added option to enable low power mode during quiet time
New Danish translation!
- Bug fixes

- Added Weather Unlocked provider
- Added Weather Underground provider
- Added Mars weather provider

- Left and right info boxes are now configurable like the status bar
- Added a new battery icon level option
- Added sleep time and restful sleep time options
- A dash now shows when data isn't available yet
- Added initial support for Pebble 2 and Pebble Time 2
- Bug fixes
Changed Forecast.io to their new branding, Dark Sky.
Updated to support the new Timeline Quick View
Added support for Master Key (pmkey.xyz)

- Added Finnish translation (thanks Janne!)
- Fixed Yr.no weather provider not working

- Added new sleep mode option
- Added weather data caching (meaning quicker refresh times after receiving a notification or navigating away)
Fixed status bar turning black at night randomly.
Fixed mixed up icons
Added missing weather icon
Fixed iOS crash
Added new configurable status bar and improved performance.
Fixed Yahoo weather (again)

data.description:
A simple and highly configurable watchface that is light on your battery.

Options include selecting colors for day and night (a full range of colors to choose from), weather provider, air quality (aqi) or temperature and many more. There are also options to display data on the status bar, include health data, battery level, etc.

Also supports Master Key (pmkey.xyz)!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed "Low Power during Quiet Time" not working as expected

data.title: Simply Light

data.description:
*** What's New (Feb 6) ***
Charge and Bluetooth disconnected status

Floaty Duck swims back and forth as the water level (representing minutes) rises.

* Settings include hourly vibrate, vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect, and scene selection.
* Shake to make Floaty Duck fly away and land or exhale bubbles while diving.
* Themes on select days. Check settings to skip ahead or visit past themes.

Let me know if you find any issues. Heart if you like!

latest_release.release_notes: Charge status and BT disconnect status

changelog.release_notes: Fix a visualization glitch.
Add support for Pebble 4.0's Quick Look.
Improve compatibility with the latest Pebble Time app.

Updated for the Pebble Time! If you have the Pebble Time, you can now choose among different two-colors themes for your photos.

Of course the app still works with the original Pebble, but only the B&W theme is supported.

ios.name: Photo Watch — Use a photo as a Pebble watchface

data.description: Instantly create your personal watchface: Photo Watch lets you send a photo from your iPhone right to your Pebble, to use it as a watchface background. Photo Watch automatically applies a well-known dithering filter to make your photo look gorgeous in any of the available two-color themes, and it can even store a single photo directly on the Pebble so that you only need connection to your phone in the first place.
data.title: Photo Watch

data.description: A watchface in hexadecimal where the numbers move across the screen leaving ghosts in their wake. data.description:
Augment your incredible Pebble with VELOCITY! A sleek, modern Watchface.

Features Include
  -  Time
  -  Date
  -  Weather
  -  Hourly Vibration
  -  Battery Meter
  -  Bluetooth Indicator
  -  Connection Loss Alert

Like Velocity? Give it a heart! 
Got a suggestion to make it better? Email developer support!

data.description:
All Info As Text watch face delivers the time, date, current weather, today's / tomorrow's forecast, and a 2 week calendar.

Config options include:
week format
temperature units
wind speed units
seconds or week #

If in 12HR mode, the watch will display seconds for 3 minutes with a watch bump. Or that field can be configured to show the week #.

Location services must be enabled for WX.

latest_release.release_notes: Fix to re-enable weather retrieval. (OpenWeatherMap now requires an APPID to be passed in.)

data.title: All Info As Text

data.description:
The squiggle line stars on the hour and ends on the minute (or is it the other way around?).

Flick your wrist to see the time and date.

Customizable settings for several languages, color, battery icon, connectivity icon, screen background, and vibration alerts.
data.title: Squiggles

data.author: Ycleptic Studios

changelog.release_notes: Original Release: Time, Weather, Connection.

data.description: A modern Watchface with large, gray hours and white minutes. A flick of the wrist briefly displays the date and weather, while a short vibration announces a loss of Bluetooth connection.

►Wochentag ist jetzt deutsch

data.author: Thorsten Stark

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.0

data.description:
A Watchface with step counter, battery level (image + number), date and digital time based on Modern extra with digital time by edwinfinch. Step counting algorithm basically taken from jathusanT (pebble_pedometer).
With settings pane where you can:
-turn battery display on/off
-turn step counting on/off
-turn seconds hand on/off
-choose step counting minimal update time (1, 5, 10, 30sec)
data.title: Modern Step

data.author: Dr. Gfeller

data.description:
ErgoBooster helps you to maintain an ergonomic posture, by gently reminding you with random vibe patterns at random time intervals.

This is the lite version with a fixed 15min interval and a static vibe pattern. For random vibe patterns and configurable time intervals, buy the full version of ErgoBooster at https://gum.co/ergobooster
or via the "Website Link" below.

data.author: P1X

changelog.release_notes:
[add] the abbreviated name of the day of the week
[mod] lowered all the probability by 100%
[fix] astronaut don't generate at the top/bottom of the "tv screen"
[add] Astronauts! 10% chance to generate. Even less to land on the big asteroid.

[add] new sprites! (astronauts not included, moved to the next update)
[+-] changed probability for space generator
[fix] bring back the day number
[fix] coming back to the starting seed
[fix] new seed was not generated properly

[add] use persistent storage to save seed dedicated to each user
[add] refresh space at each hour only
[fix] space will not refresh at app load to memory or screen refresh

[fix] app dont randomise space while in background while hour is changed
[add] now space is randomised on each app initialisation and on each hour change
- on app reload seed was always null
First public build. Work in progress.

data.description:
*** Your own unique cosmos ***

Practically infinite number of rich and fantastic backgrounds at each hour. You will never seen two identical backgrounds! Yes, that's the power of procedural generation.

Each hour new, little space is created there at your wrist.

Watchface has:
- time (12H/24H)
- battery level (%)
- day of year
- full date
- procedurally generated backgrounds

latest_release.release_notes:
[add] the abbreviated name of the day of the week
[mod] lowered all the probability by 100%
[fix] astronaut don't generate at the top/bottom of the "tv screen"

data.title: 2001: Space Watch

data.author: Mathew Reiss

changelog.release_notes: Now in color! Recompiled for beta 10
Release 1 - after two days of work.

data.description:
Simple digital watchface showing quote about time in the background, with time overlay. AM/PM indicated with triangles in top left and bottom right corners, respectively.

"Know the true value of time; snatch, seize, and enjoy every moment of it. No idleness, no laziness, no procrastination: never put off till tomorrow what you can do today." -Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

latest_release.release_notes: Now in color! Recompiled for beta 10

data.title: Typewriter

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.0 - both 12-hour and 24-hour time formats are supported.

The One Number Experience Pebble Watchface.

- Date/Time information compressed into one really long number.
- Once you crack the code, you will find ONE indispensable.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.0 - both 12-hour and 24-hour time formats are supported.

data.title: ONE

data.author: Dexterity

changelog.release_notes:
7.4 Release Notes
1. Implement XML ontimeout for watch freezing problems.
2. Implement XML onerror for logs, and to handle aborts properly.
3. Implement calls to sync error handler in all sync and message handlers, to reprocess messages and flag any freezing conditions.
4. New restart message to handle old pebble and pebble time users. Will now go to "Reload/Restart" to prompt user to reload watchface first to fix condition, and then restart watch/phone.
4. Display nothing instead of logo when receive bad icon data. For xDrip users.
5. Display nothing instead of logo when receive NON_COMPUTABLE icon data. For xDrip users.
6. New Easter eggs.

MAINTENANCE RELEASE ONLY

1. Fix for people getting CAL in raw field all the time, even after calibrating; mainly for xDrip users

*Blank timeago space has been permanently removed, which will forever cease and desist.
*Insert happy, marshmallow fluffy, dextrose like, cloud icons for timeago. 
*Take away dexcom icon for timeago, which will forever cease and desist.
*Evolve state transitions to work better together, with ambidextrous efficiency.
*Memory fixes and optimizations, which have been dexterously implemented.
*Easter eggs, new 100 / 5.5 animations. No ceasing and desisting necessary.

Release 7.1

1. New compression warning - will show COMPRESSION? when pebble detects possible compression low
2. Raw values will show between 30-500 (or MMOL equivalent), and show LO and HI outside of those values; raw values outside of those ranges will show ??
3. Timeago change so now will show last actual time received by pebble; timeago will be blank when loading or coming back from any "pebble outage" (no bluetooth,check phone, etc), and then will show timeago from last received actual reading on pebble so user can know actual last reading received
4. Time fixes so now time works across time zone changes, dexcom time changes, dexcom time drift issues, daylight savings time changes, future data point problems, xdrip time issues, and any kind of phone time issues (auto update / non auto update, etc).
5. Pebble crash fixes
6. Animation crash fixes
7. Memory problem fixes
8. Image size fixes
9. Random buzzing fixes
10. New easter egg messages

R7.0 Release Notes

1. Low vibration alert now goes down to 60.
2. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, show calculated raw on face.
3. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, show noise levels on face. Noise levels displayed - Cln Clean, Lgt Light, Med Medium, Hvy Heavy.
4. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, in special values (e.g. ???) the last three calculated values will be displayed in the BG field if they exist.
5. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, watch can vibrate on last calculated raw in special values (e.g. ???). User can set the setting in the configuration file to "Yes" or "No".
6. User can put "IOB" in T1DName in config, and if IOB is enabled on website the IOB value will show up instead of T1DName.
7. Move rig / uploader battery percentage to top half and label as "Rig".
8. Show watch battery percentage on face, and switch percentage to CHARGING when plugged in. Label as "Wch".
9. Extend RESTRT timeout so that it appears after NO BLUETOOTH timeout, and really only appears when needed.
10. Extend DATA timeout so that it appears after CHECK PHONE timeout, and really only appears when needed.
11. Change RESTRT WCH/PHN message to √APP/RESTRT, to instruct apple users to open their app, and instruct everyone to restart their watch and phone if necessary.
12. Change DATA OFFLINE message to ATTN: NO DATA to warn users that there is a problem getting data but imply we are still trying to get data and will clear the message when we can.
13. Change CHECK CGM message to CHECK RIG to clarify to the user that they need to check the entire rig, not just the CGM.
14. Ability to set custom and multiple animation messages at different BG levels in the code.

1. Extended timeout for DATA OFFLINE condition
2. Extended timeout for RSTRT WCH/PH condition
3. Added vibe for DATA OFFLINE condition
4. Don't wipeout screen for DATA OFFLINE condition
1. Added offline message

1. Fix for watch freezing
2. Fix for ERR codes
3. Fix for HTML timeouts
4. New global variable to turn off all vibrations (HardCode)
5. New slot2 loads have new config files

CGM Sleep Face, based on R5.2
SPECIAL PEBBLE CGM WATCHFACE THAT TURNS OFF ALL VIBRATIONS. Use this for my son who wears the pebble watch during his naps and at night. Also use it when I have to focus on other things like work, get some sleep while other parent is on diabetes duty, etc. Distinctive watchface in that colors are reversed so you know it's running and that vibrations are off. Can be run alongside regular CGM watchface.

data.description: SPECIAL WATCHFACE THAT TURNS OFF ALL VIBRATIONS Useful for children who wear the pebble watch during naps and at night. Also useful when adults have to focus on other things like work, get some sleep while other parent is on diabetes duty, etc. Distinctive watchface in that colors are reversed so you know it’s running and that vibrations are off. Can be run alongside regular CGM watchface.

latest_release.release_notes:
7.4 Release Notes
1. Implement XML ontimeout for watch freezing problems.
2. Implement XML onerror for logs, and to handle aborts properly.
3. Implement calls to sync error handler in all sync and message handlers, to reprocess messages and flag any freezing conditions.
4. New restart message to handle old pebble and pebble time users. Will now go to "Reload/Restart" to prompt user to reload watchface first to fix condition, and then restart watch/phone.
4. Display nothing instead of logo when receive bad icon data. For xDrip users.
5. Display nothing instead of logo when receive NON_COMPUTABLE icon data. For xDrip users.
6. New Easter eggs.

changelog.release_notes: Added support to optionally display seconds
Initial release

data.description:
Tell time in reduced fractions.

Fraction clock takes the number of hours and minutes over the total number of hours and minutes and reduces them to their lowest form. It provides an interesting new way to tell time, allowing you to easily see what fraction of the hour or day has gone by.

Features:
Vertical or Horizontal Orientation
White or Black Background
12 or 24 Hour Divisor
Leading Zeros

latest_release.release_notes: Added support to optionally display seconds
